episodes.title: History's Most Powerful Cult Leader From 2500 Years Ago
episodes.description:
Uncover the story of history's most powerful cult leader from 2500 years ago! Learn about the enigmatic presocratic philosopher and cult leader who left a lasting legacy. #ancientcults #godpythagoras #ancientphilosophers

🔔 Subscribe for more.
👍 Like this video to support the channel.
📌 Timestamps:

00:00 - Pythagoras is a fraud
00:20 - What Pythagoras was really like
01:34 - What other philosophers thought about Pythagoras
02:18 - Metempsychosis
02:48 - Source of wisdom of Pythagoras 
03:15 - Ethics of Pythagoras
03:41 - Acusmata
04:12 - Vow of silence.
04:51 - Political party of Pythagoras
05:22 - School of Pythagoras
05:49 - Who was the real Pythagoras?
06:45 - Source of misconceptions
08:16 - Types of Pythagoreans
07:39 - Eternal recurrence
07:55 - Conclusion

Delve into the fascinating world of ancient cults and discover the most powerful cult leader from 2500 years ago, a figure so influential that he was revered as a god by his followers. In this video, we'll explore the life and teachings of Pythagoras, a Presocratic philosopher who founded a mystical school of thought that would shape Western mysticism for centuries to come. From sacred geometry to esoteric teachings, Pythagoras' philosophical cult was shrouded in mystery and intrigue, with followers who believed him to be a divine being. Join us as we uncover the disturbing beliefs and practices of the Pythagorean cult, and examine the profound impact of this ancient philosopher on our understanding of philosophy and divinity. What secrets lie behind the enigmatic Pythagoras, and how did he amass such immense power and influence over his followers? The answers will leave you questioning the boundaries between philosophy and cultism.
